thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: UKZN Protests

author: news24.com
title: UKZN Protests
text:
It's appalling that the students have resorted to vandalism and that they seem to have money for booze but claim to be unable to pay fees.
 I am not prepared to entertain their grievances under these circumstances.
 They should take a leaf out of the Sunflower and Yellow Umbrella student movements in Taiwan and Hong Kong respectively.
Without violence, the Sunflower Movement in Taiwan has had an amazing impact politically.
More recently, high school students, who have had grievances about changes to the history syllabus, have also won support for the calm, informed and sophisticated manner in which they presented their views.
